name: Peruvian Body Wave 4 Bundle Deal
description:
Special 4 bundle special for Holiday Kickoff Sale. 
All orders purchased during the sale week will not be processed before Dec. 3. Please allow 48 hours for processing and 7-10 business days for shipping. Be sure to leave a valid email address to recieve your tracking number.

name: Brazilian Loose Wave Closure
description:
4"x4" Lace closure
AAAA Grade
Natural Color
Medium to low luster
Hair can be straightened and curled
Can be dyed to desired color (preferably by a professional)
Wash and condition hair with quality products for maximum wear
Hair will last 6 months to 1 year with proper care

name: Brazilian Kinky Curly Closure
description:
4"x4" Lace closure
AAAA Grade
Natural Color
Medium to low luster
Hair can be straightened and curled
Can be dyed to desired color (preferably by a professional)
Wash and condition hair with quality products for maximum wear
Hair will last 6 months to 1 year with proper care
*NOTE: PICTURE IS OF CLOSURE WITH THE CURLS NOT SEPARATED*

name: Brazilian Kinky Curly
description:
Unprocessed Virgin Hair
Comes in Natural color (off black-dark brown)
Should be washed and conditioned like your own hair
Can be dyed to any color you like
